home.realTimeNoteTaking: takes notes and organizes in real time.

game.title: Square Tomato Game
game.downloadRequirement: You need to score more than 70 points to download alt.
game.rules: Game Rules: Drag a rectangle to remove square tomatoes that sum to exactly 10. The box turns green when the sum is 10.
game.guide: Drag a rectangle to remove square tomatoes that sum to exactly 10. The box turns red when the sum is 10.
